channel.title: PJA question (maybe this is pretty hard..)
channel.description:
I'm using Project Annihilation as my base... What I got added is some commands and FULL construction and a big part of agility.. The problem is, I can't get the animations work correctly! I mean, I get the animation to play I wanted but that the player stops there and cannot move as the animation is an infinite loop (or w/e) is not that wanted, ehh...?
So to the question; how do i make that the player moves while doing the animation and does the animation I want it to do??? Thanks for answers!

item.title: PJA question (maybe this is pretty hard..)
